# (APPENDIX) Appendices {.unnumbered}

# Notation {#ap:notation}

The notation in this booklet follows @wright1982.

| Section                          | Symbol                  | Term        | Description                                                   |
|----------------------------------|:------------------------|:------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------|
| \@ref(sec:itemresponsefunctions) | $\beta_n$               | Ability     | True (but unknown) developmental score of child $n$           |
| \@ref(sec:itemresponsefunctions) | $\delta_i$              | Difficulty  | True (but unknown) difficulty of item $i$                     |
| \@ref(sec:itemresponsefunctions) | $\pi_{ni}$              | Probability | True (but unknown) probability that child $n$ passes item $i$ |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $\hat\beta_n$           | Ability     | Estimated developmental score (D-score) of child $n$          |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $\hat\delta_i$          | Difficulty  | Estimated difficulty of item $i$                              |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $P_{ni}$                | Probability | Estimated probability that child $n$ passes item $i$          |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $x_{ni}$                | Data        | Observed response of child $n$ on item $i$, 0 or 1            |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $W_{ni}$                | Variance    | Variance of $x_{ni}$                                          |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $z_{ni}$                | Residual    | Standardized residual between $x_{ni}$ and $P_{ni}$           |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $N$                     | Count       | Number of measurements (children)                             |
| \@ref(sec:itemfit)               | $L$                     | Count       | Number of items (milestones)                                  |
| \@ref(sec:iteminformation)       | $P(\hat\delta_i)$       | Probability | Conditional probability of passing item $i$                   |
| \@ref(sec:iteminformation)       | $I(\hat\delta_i)$       | Information | Item information function of item $i$                         |
| \@ref(sec:reliability)           | $R$                     | Reliability | True test reliability                                         |
| \@ref(sec:reliability)           | $\hat R$                | Reliability | Estimated test reliability                                    |
| \@ref(sec:reliability)           | $\sigma_e^2$            | Variance    | True error variance                                           |
| \@ref(sec:reliability)           | $\hat\sigma_{\hat e}^2$ | Variance    | Estimated error variance                                      |
| \@ref(sec:reliability)           | $\hat\sigma_{\hat e}$   | Variance    | Standard error of measurement (sem)                           |
| \@ref(sec:pops)                  | $f$                     | Factor      | Age-adjustment factor                                         |

```{r warnings}
warnings()
```
